articles.author: Louis Oelofse
articles.title: Europe swelters as early summer heat breaks records - DW
articles.description: With temperatures in Spain setting new records for June, authorities warn the heat will intensify through midweek in Europe. The tennis tournament Wimbledon is set for its hottest opening day on record.
articles.content:
Temperatures soared past 40 degrees Celsius (104 F) across parts of Europe over the weekend, as an early-summer heat wave tightened its grip on the continent.
In Spain, temperatures hit 46°C (114.8°… [+3335 chars]
